install-dependencies.command: echo "Setting up config for local Cassandra...";cp /workspace/httpie-katapod/assets/config-cassandra.json /home/vscode/.config/httpie/config.json

cqlsh.command: HOME=/root sudo /home/vscode/.pyenv/shims/http --auth-type astra  -a swag: POST :/rest/v2/keyspaces/swag/metrics key=$CODESPACE_NAME path=astra date=`date +%s`

sqlsh.command: HOME=/root sudo /home/vscode/.pyenv/shims/http --auth-type astra  -a swag: POST :/rest/v2/keyspaces/swag/metrics key=$CODESPACE_NAME path=cassandra date=`date +%s`
HOME=/root sudo /home/vscode/.pyenv/shims/http --auth-type astra  -a swag: POST :/rest/v2/keyspaces/swag/emails email=$(git config user.email) path=astra date=`date +%s`
HOME=/root sudo /home/vscode/.pyenv/shims/http --auth-type astra  -a swag: POST :/rest/v2/keyspaces/swag/metrics email=$(git config user.email) path=cassandra date=`date +%s`
